'''Common-Use Note Holder''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Common-Use Note Holder is obtainable by buying the Gnostic Chorus package of the [[Fontinalia]] Battle Pass.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.

|time = 16h
